channel.title: Ignore Special Attack Timer?
channel.description: Hi! I want to add Granite Maul special to my server (Just like real RS) I got the emotes, GFX...etc done! But When I went to test it out a click on the special attack bar a few times hoping that it will double/triple hit.. But it doesnt.. It appears that it has like a timer.. Because once I click I have to wait about one second for it to attack... Is there a way to remove the special attack timer so that when I 'spam' the special attack bar it double/triple hits my opponnent?

item.title: Ignore Special Attack Timer?
item.dc:creator: @Skullator Skullator
item.description:
@Skullator wrote:

Hi! I want to add Granite Maul special to my server (Just like real RS) I got the emotes, GFX…etc done! But When I went to test it out a click on the special attack bar a few times hoping that it will double/triple hit… But it doesnt… It appears that it has like a timer… Because once I click I have to wait about one second for it to attack… Is there a way to remove the special attack timer so that when I ‘spam’ the special attack bar it double/triple hits my opponnent?

Read full topic
